title: BRIEF-Era Group Signs An Exclusive Maintenance And Repair Agreement With Pratt & Whitney Canada

organizations.name: brief-era group signs an exclusive maintenance and repair agreement with pratt & whitney canada
brief-era group signs an exclusive maintenance

text: 10 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Era Group Signs An Exclusive Maintenance And Repair Agreement With Pratt & Whitney Canada Reuters Staff Feb 28 (Reuters) - Era Group Inc: * ERA GROUP SIGNS AN EXCLUSIVE MAINTENANCE AND REPAIR AGREEMENT WITH PRATT & WHITNEY CANADA * ERA GROUP INC - ‍ AGREEMENT COVERS FIVE ENGINE MODELS POWERING HELICOPTERS FROM THREE AIRFRAME OEMS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
